fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Chemical industry related legislation, policies, public consultations, projects, events and publications.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The association was established in 1990 with the intention to act jointly to promote the development, protection and enforcement of interests of undertakings performing and carrying out production and related activities in the  Hungarian chemical industry sector.
